courseSectionInformation: Same as ANSC 366 and ANTH 342. Credit is not given for both IB 329 and ANSC 363. Prerequisite: IB 150 and MCB 150; or consent of instructor.
description: Introductory course emphasizing how patterns of behavior promote survival, change through evolution, and are modified by the environment. Same as ANSC 366 and ANTH 342. Credit is not given for both IB 329 and ANSC 363. Prerequisite: IB 150 and MCB 150; or consent of instructor.
label: Animal Behavior
